title: Interpretation of dreams of my ex-fiance holding my hand in a dream

Interpretation of dreams of my ex-fiancé holding my hand in a dream The interpretation of a dream of my ex-fiancé holding my hand in a dream can indicate getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees that her ex-fiancé is holding her hand and smiling in a dream, this may be a sign that she is relieved of tension, and God knows best. Also, seeing her ex-fiancé holding her hand in a dream may indicate his attachment to his love, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of dreams to see laughter in a dream for a married or unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin and major commentators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing laughter in a dream: Laughter is associated with a feeling of happiness and joy, but in the world of dreams it has the same meanings and associations. It may have a different interpretation and can indicate worries or misfortunes that befall the dreamer, and many visions interpret the opposite. It is of particular importance if it is in the circle of delusions, and in this article we explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing laughter in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of seeing laughter in a dream The interpretation of laughter in a dream includes many interpretations that express the mood accompanying the forerunner and may have expressed other secrets, and through these Points We explain the interpretation of a dream about laughter: Seeing laughter in the dreamer’s dream indicates happy events that the dreamer will experience in the coming days, especially if the laughter is within reason, that is, not loud. Interpretation scholars have found that smiling is better than laughing out loud. When you see a loud laugh, this vision indicates sadness as a result of an urgent need for something and a wrong decision. In the case of the dreamer who was single and saw himself laughing until his teeth appeared, this is good news related to his engagement in the coming days. If If the dreamer is married and expecting a pregnancy, the vision indicates that pregnancy will occur. Seeing a slight smile on the dreamer indicates the good news that awaits him and the positive changes that are occurring in his life. As for laughing with sarcasm and mockery, it is a complete failure and inability to achieve the dreams and goals that the dreamer seeks. See also : Interpretation of a dream about seeing insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and what it indicates. Interpretation of a dream about seeing laughter for a single woman: An unmarried girl is waiting for good news about marriage, and therefore dreams are of utmost importance and she always searches for the correct interpretation for them, and through these points we explain the interpretation of a dream about laughter for a single woman: If she sees An unmarried girl dreams that she is laughing lightly, this indicates her engagement in the coming days. Seeing an unmarried girl smiling to herself in a dream means that she is pursuing worldly pleasures without worrying about the future, and the feeling of remorse may be the result of missed opportunities and perhaps foolish actions she has taken. Seeing laughter Light in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the girl’s kindness, piety, and good reputation among people. Seeing a single girl laughing in the street indicates unpleasant events that will happen to that girl. Loud laughter for an unmarried girl in a dream means that she will fall into misfortunes and will not be able to act and get out of them. Crises. See also: Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction in a dream for an unmarried and married woman in Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing laughter for a married woman. A married woman has many dreams, and it is possible that these dreams are the result of the circumstances in which she lives, and in these points we explain the interpretation of the dream about seeing laughter for a married woman: Seeing a wife laughing at herself in a dream and trying not to show her face indicates that she has achieved her prominent goals that she has always tried to achieve. Seeing a married woman in a dream laughing hysterically indicates pursuing worldly pleasures and desires without paying attention to God’s punishment. As for

Seeing a married woman in a dream laughing hysterically indicates pursuing worldly pleasures and desires without paying attention to God’s punishment. As for

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting meat

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing cutting meat in a dream We present to you on the Moments website what is new and typical in this article on our website, the interpretation of cutting meat and meat in a dream and meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of cutting meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the meanings of meat in a dream in general, cutting meat In a dream, cooked meat in a dream, cutting meat in a dream, cutting meat in a dream, cannibalism in a dream, to learn more on our website Mohazat.Interpretation of seeing meat cutting in a dream Seeing meat in a dream generally means nutrition, good health, and correct morals. Cooked meat in a dream symbolizes effort, fatigue, and work pressure. Raw meat in a dream symbolizes pain, unhappiness, and mistreatment by someone close. Evidence of the emergence of some evil or evil and disasters. Read also: Interpretation of seeing and eating grapes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eating meat in a dream. And who dreams that He eats meat from an acquaintance or friend, it means that it haunts him and reminds him of bad things. If he sees that he is eating pieces of camel meat, this indicates its benefit, goodness, and abundance of food. Interpretation of seeing meat being cut in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing meat being cut in a dream indicates the occurrence of a lot of pain and trouble, as the awareness of cutting tender meat in a dream indicates death or gossip. Being aware of cutting and cooking in a dream indicates revealing someone’s secrets. A close friend or girlfriend. Interpretation of seeing rotten meat in a dream: When a person dreams that he is cutting rotten meat and eating it raw, this means ill health for himself or a loved one, or illness and exhaustion of a family member. Eating this indicates the coming sustenance and contentment that is righteous and lawful. Interpretation of seeing raw meat in a dream: Cutting raw meat in a dream indicates exerting greater effort to obtain large sums of money or needing more time to obtain it. Such as meat cut into small pieces or chopped and mashed or ground in a dream shows the goodness that will come to the dreamer and its strength and blessings in his life. Interpretation of a dream about cutting meat Being aware of ground meat in a dream indicates backbiting, gossip, and desire for the deceased. An unmarried man’s awareness of ground meat in a dream indicates that he is on his way to marriage. As for someone who sees pieces of meat in a dream, this indicates illness, fatigue, hardship, and lack of work.

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Treasure in a dream: Seeing treasure indicates many good things, either money or positive transformations that the dreamer enjoys, as it expresses the fulfillment of desires and ambitions, and interpretations vary according to the social status of the individual. A sign of a mistake and committing sins, and we must repent to God together. We present the most important interpretations on this topic. Treasure in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about treasure in a dream is one of the visions that translates into goodness in all aspects of life for its owner, whether he is a man or a woman. If the dreamer is a man and sees If the treasure is in his house, this indicates that he will earn money and profit without fatigue and hardship. As for dreaming of a treasure of pearls and coral, this indicates happiness and pleasant events for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees a treasure in a dream, this is evidence of satisfaction, but if the treasure consists of antique pieces This means that there are some evil and envious people around him. In a pregnant woman’s dream, if she sees a treasure, this indicates a baby boy, and extracting it from the ground is a sign of success in all aspects of life. Scientists believe that seeing treasure in large quantities indicates good news of goodness and joy. And the enormous pleasure that will come to the dreamer. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google, the online dream interpretation site. Treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, believes that treasure in a dream has a good indication of legitimate profit and huge money that the dreamer will acquire during the coming period. In the event that the dreamer extracts treasure from the ground, this is a sign of high status and gaining the highest grades. But when a man wins treasure by digging for it, it shows that he has character among people and makes the right decisions. The dreamer in a dream who pulls gold from the ground, indicates Happy events and happiness that will come to him. An unmarried young man or girl who sees a treasure in a dream indicates the approaching engagement or marriage and the stability of affairs. A married woman’s dream of a treasure leads to many problems and obstacles for which she is looking for a solution. Treasure in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of treasure in One dream means positive transformations in the dreamer's life and pleasant events that will come to him. Interpreters believe that the treasure acquired by the dreamer indicates taking responsibility for himself, which will lead to the fulfillment of all desires. A girl who sees a lot of treasure in her dream, and is not yet married, is a sign However, she has a new job opportunity. Extracting treasure in an unmarried girl’s dream means the arrival of dreams and the end of the period of difficulties, and the marriage of her relative to a financially suitable person may be amicable. When an unmarried woman sees golden treasure in her dream, the eyes hidden within her and many enemies surrounding her appear. Treasure in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a treasure in a dream indicates that she will be blessed with a male child and will be rich and loyal to her parents. A woman’s dream of treasure can be a sign of abundance, happiness, and stability in her life. When the dreamer sees treasure

title: Interpretation of a dream about a gold set for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gold set for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if a woman sees herself in a dream with a gold set. This indicates that she will soon hear happy news, which will make her happy when she is, for example, pregnant. In addition, this may indicate The vision indicates that he will live a social life full of joy and happiness. But if she does not feel happy in her life. This vision shows that she is exposed to some problems in her married life that hinder her routine, and despite the ease of her husband’s financial situation, she is constantly exposed to these problems. As Imam Ibn Sirin says : If a married woman sees a piece of gold in a dream. This is a sign that she cannot bear the responsibility of marriage and husband. Most often, the weight of gold indicates the burden that falls on the wife in terms of responsibility for her husband and children. We chose for you: Dream Interpretation of Gold Bracelets for a Single GirlInterpretation A dream about a gold set for a married woman according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Both Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen believe that if a married woman sees a piece of gold in a dream, it is evidence that she will achieve many of her dreams and aspirations, especially if she is stressed and worried about something, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In addition to seeing gold In a married woman’s dream, it is a sign that she will get a lot of money, whether from her work or from her inheritance. As for the repetition of this dream for a married woman, this indicates that she will be released soon because she will hear the news of her pregnancy, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if a married woman sees Her dream is that her husband bought her a gold set. This is a sign of how much her husband loves her and cares about their comfort and the stability of their home and life. But if the husband is miserable, this vision is evidence that his recovery will turn for the better towards his wife, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Is a dream about a gold ring good or bad for a woman? Married? Many interpretation scholars believe that seeing gold in a married woman’s dream is a praiseworthy dream. For this reason, there is no need to worry about this dream, because it indicates the end of the problems between the spouses and the return of their relationship to its previous era. If she dreams that she is married, then the golden set. This is a sign of her children’s excellence and success in their academic lives, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. This vision may relate to the children of a married woman and not just her. It indicates the possibility of marrying one of her sons or daughters, or it may indicate the goodness that one of her friends will find, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if a married woman has a gold set in her dream. This indicates the goodness that she will see in her life soon, and it shows that she will occupy a great position among her family and lovers, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. What if a married woman sees in her dream that her gold has been stolen? This is a sign of the difficult experience that She will go through, for example, her husband’s betrayal or her leaving the job she loves, so she will have to take care of the people around her. What if a married woman sees in her dream that she sold her gold set. This is a sign that he will suffer from a serious illness or suffer from severe financial hardship, So

title: The most accurate 25 details about the interpretation of a dream about a forest and its meanings

preview.html: Interpretations of senior scholars and jurists for seeing a forest in a dream The forest is a place where animals, trees and reptiles abound, but seeing it in a dream is one of the frightening visions, especially if it is dark and contains predatory animals. In the following article. The forest in a dream The interpretation of a dream in a forest means that the dreamer will live in harmony in all aspects of his life, and this interpretation will occur if the dreamer was happy while in the forest because it was full of birds, their beautiful chirps, blooming flowers and a paved road without sharp rocks or mazes. Seeing a forest in a dream indicates the extent of psychological satisfaction and comfort that the dreamer is currently experiencing, especially if the forest in his dream is beautiful and free of poisonous insects, reptiles and deadly animals. If the dreamer sees a crow in the forest, this is a bad omen that he will soon receive sad news. But if the dreamer dreams of white doves, this vision will bring him good news, whether on a personal, professional or academic level. If the dreamer finds a predator in the forest, this dream symbolizes his future, as he will face many obstacles and challenges that It will temporarily prevent him from achieving his dream, but soon he will stand up again and face these challenges. Problems and will overcome them. With absolute strength and solidity, and some interpreters confirmed that this vision carries another meaning, which is that the dreamer will face great hostility with someone soon, and he must pray to God a lot to ease his circumstances so that this hostility does not develop into bloody and intense battles. It is good luck for the dreamer if he dreams that the forest inside him is full of fat or fat animals, because this will mean that his financial conditions will rise to the point of prosperity and abundance. As for if the dreamer's luck is bad, he will see in his dream the forest in which there are many delicate or weak animals, and this dream is interpreted in two meanings. The first sign is related to the health aspect of the dreamer's life, as his body becomes sick as a result of a difficult disease that he will soon contract. The second sign is related to his financial aspect and indicates the great financial deficit that he will suffer from. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is in a forest, this indicates his desire to escape from what causes him anxiety and he cannot stand with it or live with it, and because life consists of stages or periods, if the dreamer sees that in the forest, the vision will be interpreted as he will end one stage of his life and enter a new stage full of activity and successes The sequence that will make him more confident in himself and his abilities than before. If a man plants a tree in the forest in a dream, this vision is interpreted that his offspring will be boys, but if a man sees in his dream that he is in the forest and cuts one of his trees, this dream is disastrous and means that he will soon become a widower. His wife will pass away to God's mercy. If a man sees that he is walking in the forest and a scary snake appears to him, this dream is a symbol of betrayal, that is, the man will be betrayed by one of his relatives, and it may come from his wife. Still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Joe

If the dreamer sees a crow in the forest, this is a bad omen that he will soon receive sad news. But if the dreamer dreams of white doves, then this vision will bring him good news whether on a personal, professional or professional level. The first sign is related to the aspect Health in the dreamer’s life, as his body becomes ill as a result of a difficult disease that he will soon suffer from. The second sign is related to his financial side and indicates the great financial deficit that he will suffer from. title: Interpretation of a dream about a stranger throwing stones at me

preview.html: I LikeFansSubscribeFansInterpretation of a dream about a stranger throwing stones at me. This vision is one of the few and unusual visions. Certainly, there are many interpretations of this vision, some of which are good and others are bad and unpleasant. Such a dream shows that the person having the vision is a hypocrite and lying. Of course, the interpretation of the vision varies according to the dreamer’s condition and his social and psychological state during this period of time. A strange interpretation of throwing stones at me for a single woman. If he sees a free girl in her dream, he Someone she did not know threw stones at her, which indicates that there are people conspiring against her enemies, complicating her problems and wanting to harm her. What if the girl saw herself trying to get away from him and was able to escape before he hit her with the stones. This is an indication that he will be able to locate those who are there. On the ground and escaping from their evil. If an unmarried girl sees this in her dream, strangers try to throw stones at her. She continues on her way without being disturbed. It is an indication that there are those around her who are talking about her in wrong and insulting terms, but she does not pay attention to them, causing them depression and hatred towards her. But If she sees in her dream a person she knows and loves very much. But in reality, a quarrel arose between them and he was trying to throw stones at her in the dream. This is a sign that this person is cheating on her and will try to harm her. Interpretation of dreams of a small child throwing stones at meIf one sees a small child in a dream, he will throw stones at him This is evidence that this person is lying to his relatives. He is lying to them about some vital matters and insulting their lives. Even if he saw a free girl in her dream, a young boy was throwing stones at her. It is a strong indication that this wise girl has committed a grave mistake to someone in her life. He still carries his guilt on his heels. And if someone sees a child trying to throw a large, heavy stone in a dream. It is a sign that the dreamer has a big problem and cannot solve it. If the stone that the child carries in the dream is light and easy to carry, then this is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of The great injustice that happened to him in his life. But if the stone that a child threw in a dream was a white stone, then this is a good vision that indicates great livelihood and abundant money on the path of insight. Interpretation of a dream about stones in a dream for a married woman. See more Throwing stones In a married woman’s dream, there are unpleasant visions It predicts many problems that the dreamer will face in her life. If a married woman sees in her dream that stones are in her house. This is an indication that there are many problems and multiple family conflicts between her and her husband. What if the dreamer sees him walking with stones and that he is hurting her in her dream, because it is an indication of the extent of suffering. Which this woman is experiencing. But there is a positive side to the interpretation of this vision for a married woman. That is, if the stones that she sees in the dream are white, then this is a sign of great goodness, great nourishment, and comfort after fatigue and difficulties. Interpretation of seeing a man throwing stones in a dreamIf a man sees someone in his dream They threw stones at him, and this is an indication of many problems and difficulties

title: Interpretation of the color pink in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the color pink in a dream is what we will discuss today through this article through the encyclopedia, and the color pink is the favorite color for many females. It is also called the color pink and in the English language (rosé) and it is a symbol of flowers and roses, as this color prevails especially in the spring season, It decorates gardens and parks, and because it has this character and the psychological effect it leaves. For those who see it a feeling of calm and happiness, what are the consequences of seeing it in a dream? To answer this question that many people have, we present our next article, so follow us. Interpretation of the color pink in a dream According to what was mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin regarding seeing the color pink in a dream, we mention the following: Color Pink in a dream symbolizes good luck and abundance. For the dreamer to see that he is in a place where pink is widespread, this indicates psychological comfort and self-confidence, and his circumstances will change for the better in all matters. Wearing pink in a dream indicates the coming of happy occasions and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing pink flowers In a dream, it indicates the purity of the dreamer’s soul and good intentions, in addition to good behavior among people. The dominant pink color is lighter than that, and if the pink color in the dream is dark, this indicates the dreamer’s strong passion. Wearing a pink dress in a dream for a single woman. Pink color in a dream Free women are good and happy news and we mention it in detail in the following points: Wearing the color pink in a dream is a sign of love and a successful romantic relationship in her life. The color pink in a person’s dream symbolizes his realism in thinking and decision-making. A girl who wears pink lipstick in her dream shows bliss. And the happiness that will come to her. Interpretation of pink shoes in a dream for a single woman: The color pink in a single woman’s dream can be in what she is wearing in the form of a bag or shoes, which we explain below: Wearing pink shoes in a dream means that a good man with a good character will propose to her soon. The pink bag in a dream of an unmarried woman symbolizes the fulfillment of her dreams and goals and what she has been struggling for for a long time. Wearing pink in a dream means happy occasions and good news about their union. Interpretation of pink in a dream for a married womanThe following is the interpretation of pink in a dream for a married woman: Seeing A married woman wearing pink clothes indicates good news, a lot of sustenance for her and her husband, and her husband’s high status in his work. Painting the walls of the house pink in a dream means that her house will be filled with happy occasions. Pink home furniture in a dream symbolizes the strength of the emotional relationship between her and her husband. And their children. Buying a dress in a friendly color or giving it as a gift from her husband indicates the approaching pregnancy. The color pink in a person’s dream generally indicates psychological stability and family happiness. The color pink in a dream for a pregnant woman. The color pink in a pregnant woman’s dream has good associations that we mention below: The color pink indicates A pregnant woman dreams of her good health

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead grandmother in Al-Osaimi’s dream?

preview.html: Grandmother in a dream and the interpretation of her appearance when she is dead. Watching the return of the dead in a dream is an indication of their desire to deliver certain specific messages to their relatives, confirmation that the dreamer will receive a lot of money, and confirmation of the dreamer’s lack of tenderness and feeling. Security, and evidence that the dreamer will change his situation for the better, and this vision explains the condition and condition of the grandmother. The position is due to the abundance of good deeds. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Interpretation of a dream about a dead grandmother: Seeing a dead grandmother in a dream is a sign of relief that will come to you soon. If the dreamer is still studying, this is a sign that he will achieve high grades Very, which makes him stand out from others. If the grandmother is wearing a white robe, then this dream can be a warning to the dreamer to draw closer to his Lord and obey his commandments. If a pregnant woman sees that her grandmother is giving birth to a beautiful child and his face is shining with light, this is a sign that she will give birth to a beautiful girl. If a married woman sees that her grandmother is hugging her happily, this indicates the stability of her life and the life of her husband. When a Virgin sees that her grandmother is lying next to her in her bed, this dream indicates that she will soon marry a very good man. Seeing my grandmother alive in a dream If you see your grandmother alive dying in a dream This is evidence that God will grant her a long life and good health. If you see that he is speaking to you and giving you some commandments and then he dies, this indicates that he fears you from betraying life, and he is always talking to you, giving you advice and life experiences, and this is a warning. Of God? To approach her and offer her help. Because they need self-control and psychological support due to their advanced age and illness that weakens their structure. What does it mean to dream that I saw my dead grandmother in a dream? If a girl sees that her grandmother invites her to pray with her, this is evidence that God loves this girl and illuminates her face with light, and evidence that the girl She will live in a state of psychological stability and reassurance and feel safe. If a married woman sees in her dream that her grandmother wants to walk around her house, then this dream is good news for her that blessings will come soon and evidence that she will hear news that will make her very happy, perhaps the news that she is pregnant with a new child. But if It is observed in a dream that the grandmother appears in a bad image. Her condition is stressful and the anxiety is clear on her face. This dream is evidence of the dreamer’s shortcomings in certain matters, such as lack of worship or disobedience to parents. If the grandmother hits her grandson, this is evidence that the dreamer will get into a big problem. It will make his life difficult and make him unable to make any right decision. I dreamed that my grandmother died and she is dead. This dream is one of the very good dreams. It promises the dreamer that the person who comes to him will be happy and that he will hear the good news that he was trying to reach, and it gives him good tidings that he will get married or go to A wedding is coming soon. But if the grandmother is sad and wearing black clothes, then this dream is evidence that the dreamer’s environment will be filled with sadness over the loss of a loved one. title: 7 pieces of evidence for interpreting a dream about my pregnant sister according to Ibn Sirin. Learn about them in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my pregnant sister: A sister is a companion and a soul mate. Everything that happens to her, especially the happy one, brings joy and happiness to a person’s heart, and when he watches her pregnancy in a dream, the dreamer’s feeling is mixed between joy and the desire to know the interpretation and what the interpretation will bring him, whether it is good and he expects us to leave him joy and good news or bad. We seek refuge with God and may He seek refuge from it, and this is what we explain in this article through the largest number of cases related to this symbol, as well as interpretations and interpretations that belong to the great scholars and interpreters in the world of dreams such as the great scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about my pregnant sister Seeing your sister pregnant in the world of dreams is hers. There are many connotations that we mention through the following cases to clarify the meaning: If the dreamer sees that her sister in a dream is pregnant, this symbolizes the strong relationship that unites them and their intense love for each other. The pregnancy of a sister in a dream indicates the success and excellence that she will achieve in her life and makes her the center of everyone around her. Seeing a pregnant sister being pregnant in a dream indicates that God will grant her the birth of a beautiful woman who will be good in herself. The dreamer who sees in a dream that his sister is carrying a harbinger of good luck in her life. Interpretation of a dream about my pregnant sister by Ibn SirinOne of the most prominent interpreters in the field of dreams is the scholar Ibn Sirin, and in Below we present some of the interpretations he received regarding the sister’s pregnancy in a dream: The sister came in a dream to Ibn Sirin with a vision that indicates a change in her condition for the better and enjoyment of luxury in life and well-being. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his sister is pregnant, this symbolizes the multiple sources of his income and the abundance of means of livelihood. Which he will enjoy in the coming period. Seeing a sister being pregnant in a dream indicates the fulfillment of long-awaited desires and dreams. Interpretation of a dream about my sister being pregnant with a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a sister being pregnant varies according to the dreamer’s marital status, and the following is the interpretation of the unmarried girl’s perception of this symbol: The unmarried girl who Dreaming that her sister is pregnant indicates her desire to get married and have children, which will be reflected in her dreams. If an unmarried girl sees her married sister pregnant in a dream, this symbolizes the great discoveries and developments that will occur in the coming period and will make her happy. The pregnancy of an unmarried sister in the dreamer’s dream It is a sign of her success on the scientific and practical level. Seeing a single girl carrying her sister in a dream shows her bright future and the achievements that she will achieve. Interpretation of a dream about my pregnant sister for a married woman. A married woman who dreams of carrying her sister is evidence of the stability of her married life and that God will give her good offspring. If she sees a married woman in Dreaming that her sister is pregnant and lost her child, this symbolizes that she is going through a difficult period full of bad events and she must be patient and calculating. The pregnancy of a married sister in a dream is a sign of alleviating her worries and achieving high positions in her field of work. Interpretation of a dream about my sister being pregnant with a divorced woman who sees in a dream That her sister is pregnant is a sign of developments that will occur in her life and that will make her very happy and enjoyable.if she sees it
